member.name: T:ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectory
member.summary: Class consisting of actions that can be performed against an Active Directory domain

member.name: M:ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectory.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance connected to a single domain

member.name: M:ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectory.GetAllSecurityGroups
member.summary: Returns a list of all Security Groups found in the domain

member.name: M:ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectory.GetGroupDetails(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the details of a group including members

member.name: M:ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectory.FindUsersByLastName(System.String)
member.summary: Finds all User objects in the domain by lastname/surname
member.param: The lastname or surname of users that wish to be found

member.name: M:ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectory.GetUserDetails(System.String)
member.summary: Returns details of a user for a given username

member.name: M:ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectory.CreateNewUser(ActiveDirectory.Models.User,System.String)
member.summary: Create a new user in the domain
member.param: Properties of the user to be created. Properties supported include: FirstName, MiddleName, LastName, DisplayName, SamAccountName(username), Description, TelephoneNumber, EmployeeId, OfficeName, CompanyName, Manager, Department
Password to set for user account

member.name: M:ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectory.UnlockUserAccount(System.String)
member.summary: Unlocks a user account by username

member.name: M:ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectory.ChangeUserPassword(System.String,System.String)
member.param: A user's DistinguishedName may be found with FindUsersByLastName() or GetUserDetails()

member.name: M:ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectory.CheckUsernameAvailability(System.String)
member.summary: Checks to see if a username already exists within the domain

member.name: M:ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectory.DisableUserAccount(System.String)
member.summary: Disables a user account by the distinguished name
member.param: A user's DistinguishedName may be found with FindUsersByLastName() or GetUserDetails()

member.name: M:ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectory.EnableUserAccount(System.String)
member.summary: Enables a user account by the distinguished name
member.param: A user's DistinguishedName may be found with FindUsersByLastName() or GetUserDetails()

member.name: M:ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectory.AddUserToGroup(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a user to a group
member.param: A user's DistinguishedName may be found with FindUsersByLastName() or GetUserDetails()
A group's DistinguishedName may be found with GetAllSecurityGroups() or GetGroupDetails()

member.name: M:ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectory.RemoveUserFromGroup(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Removes a user from a group
member.param: A user's DistinguishedName may be found with FindUsersByLastName() or GetUserDetails()
A group's DistinguishedName may be found with GetAllSecurityGroups() or GetGroupDetails()

member.name: M:ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectory.MoveUserToNewOU(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Moves a user or group from one OU to another
member.param: Users DistinguishedName may be found with FindUsersByLastName or GetUserDetails

member.name: T:ActiveDirectory.Models.Group
member.summary: Object class for Security/Distrbution groups in Active Directory

member.name: P:ActiveDirectory.Models.Group.DistinguishedName
member.summary: Distinguished name declaring name and location of group

member.name: T:ActiveDirectory.Models.User
member.summary: Object class for user accounts in Active Directory

member.name: P:ActiveDirectory.Models.User.Description
member.summary: Description of user - also used for Title

member.name: P:ActiveDirectory.Models.User.DistinguishedName
member.summary: Distinguished name declaring name and location of the user

member.name: P:ActiveDirectory.Models.User.Enabled
member.summary: Bool declaring whether the account is enabled or not.

member.name: P:ActiveDirectory.Models.User.IsAccountLockedOut
member.summary: Bool declaring whether the account is locked out or not due to a number of failed login attempts

member.name: P:ActiveDirectory.Models.User.LastBadPasswordAttempt
member.summary: Date of last failed login attempt

member.name: P:ActiveDirectory.Models.User.LastLogon
member.summary: Date of last successful login attempt
